meanings.definition: A short message posted on the social media platform Twitter.
meanings.sent1: I read her tweets every day to see what she's up to.
meanings.sent2: She sent out a tweet about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The tweets from the company account always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her tweets were like little snippets of her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The tweet she posted yesterday went viral within minutes.

meanings.definition: The chirping sound made by a bird.
meanings.sent1: The sweet tweets of the birds filled the morning air.
meanings.sent2: I love waking up to the cheerful tweets of the sparrows.
meanings.sent3: The loud tweets of the robin woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: The tweets of the nightingale were like a lullaby in the evening.
meanings.sent5: The tweets of the canary were a melody in the garden.

meanings.definition: To post a message on Twitter.
meanings.sent1: She tweets about her travels to keep her followers updated.
meanings.sent2: I usually tweet about interesting articles I come across.
meanings.sent3: He tweets so often that his friends joke he's addicted to Twitter.
meanings.sent4: She tweeted her thoughts on the latest movie release.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity tweeted a thank you message to all her fans.
